items.name: Flame Ring Attack
items.description: Immediately cripple enemies close to you.

items.name: Flamethrower Attack
items.description: Shoot a flame towards the enemy base, burning all in its path.

items.name: Cross lane attack
items.description: Attack an area on the other lane of the map.

items.name: Defense Buff
items.description: Increase your defense to you can take more punishment.

items.name: Speed Buff
items.description: Increase your speed to you can move faster.

items.name: Attack Buff
items.description: Increase your attack to you deal more damage.

items.name: Healing Ring Spell
items.description: Immediately heal teammates close to you.

items.name: Hero healer
items.description: Heal another player in need, use next to the player you want to heal.

items.name: Invisibility cloak
items.description: Turn invisible to enemy grunts, so you are not attacked.

items.name: Drop Bomb Attack
items.description: Drop a bomb that will explode after a wait, hurting your enemies.

items.name: Base Destroyer
items.description: Deal huge damage to the enemy base when in range.
